title: Brain Research Apprenticeships in New York at Columbia (BRAINYAC)
explanation: The term "underprivileged communities" is used to describe a socioeconomic context related to diversity and inclusion in STEM, which falls under broader social and political considerations.

title: Multigenerational Persistence of Environmental Exposure
explanation: The term "underprivileged communities" is used in the context of environmental policy and addressing inequalities faced by those in "polluted neighborhoods" and at the "lower end of the socio-economic ladder". This leans towards a social and political understanding of disadvantage.
